content:
My name is Gilbert Fontana and this website is currently under development. I’m an economist with a particular interest in topics related to labor economics, economics of education and public finance. I currently work as an analyst at Kommuninvest, the largest lender to Swedish local governments.
On my blog, I discuss current economic issues, mainly related to the labor market. My purpose is to describe topics related to unemployment, wage formation, matching and education from both a micro- and macroeconomic perspective. The ambition is to illustrate these topics from both a Swedish and an international context.
Opinions are my own and do not necessarily represent the views of my employer.
summary: My name is Gilbert Fontana and this website is currently under development. I’m an economist with a particular interest in topics related to labor economics, economics of education and public finance.
title: Gilbert Fontana
